introContent: Mental wellbeing: An aspect of life often given a back seat. Mental health is just like physical health but is often neglected until in extreme cases. Mental health is not just  absence of mental disorders but it is rather about  being mentally healthy and a state of overall well being....
postContent: Mental health is just like physical health but is often neglected until in extreme cases. Mental health is not just  absence of mental disorders but it is rather about being mentally healthy and a state of overall well being. Mental well-being is how people cope with the stressful situations and  people's feelings and thoughts and to learn to cope with the negative thoughts and feelings.
